name: The Con
description:
How you work the con is up to you! Intense fighting action plus a freeform con system puts you in charge of making all the right moves. Stage a comeback. Take a dive. Play it to the wire, or play it safe. Whether it's big money or a busted con, it's all in your hands.
Key Features:
• 5 customizable fighting styles
• Unique "in-the-fight" cam
• Square off wirelessly (Ad Hoc) and win items from your friends
